message: Let's start with a fair split, we can negotiate from here
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle
Meet you in the middle, but I'm willing to give you a bit more
You're getting closer, but I want more
I'm being more aggressive, but I still want to be fair
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to compromise
I'm getting desperate, but I still want to get something
I'm not going to let you get the short end of the stick
I'm getting really desperate, take it or leave it
You're running out of time, take the last decent offer
